dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause of the VCORE increase, matching the human expert report.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not explicitly mention the full CM → CPU → DDR → VCORE chain.
missing_elements: Full CM → CPU → DDR → VCORE chain

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately identified key metrics such as VCORE and DDR usage percentages and CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The agent's reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The agent provided practical suggestions for verifying CM voting and adjusting CPU frequency settings.
